name: keyg (itch) (AxelSonic)
description:
keyg is a puzzle/arcade game with very unique controls.

Your keyboard is a level. Each key is a room on that level. 

Solve puzzles, avoid enemies, discover the mystery of this strange world and befriend its inhabitants.

Features:

  • Unique gameplay
  • Big variety of puzzle and arcade levels
  • Captivating story with numerous endings
  • Full support of QWERTY, AZERTY and QWERTZ keyboards
  • Colorblind mode
